dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset contains street scene images of German urban environments, labeled with semantic segmentation masks. It is used to study the texture bias of deep neural networks in semantic segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: Alexey Dosovitskiy
German Ros
Felipe Codevilla
Antonio Lopez
Vladlen Koltun
dcterms:description: The CARLA driving simulator provides synthetic images for urban driving scenarios, complete with semantic segmentation masks. It is utilized to analyze texture bias in deep neural networks.
dcterms:title: CARLA driving simulator
